entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of ice pellets. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of ice pellets late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 5 in the evening then falling. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of ice pellets early in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
